name: Diablo
description:
This script will install "Diablo" GOG edition with Tchernobog mod, it's the new name and last version of the Belzebub mod. It has multiplayer  and  others new features/corrected bugs. 
During install please let all options by default.
Tchernobog site: https://mod.diablo.noktis.pl/
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- Tchernobog  v0.1.6c
- To find others players for online games, ask on Discord: https://discord.gg/82BaSAP.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

files.gog: N/A:Select the installer downloaded from GOG

content:
custom-name: Diablo - Tchernobog - GOG
files:
- inno: http://constexpr.org/innoextract/files/snapshots/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
- tchernobog: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Diablo/Tchernobog.zip
- gog: N/A:Select the installer downloaded from GOG
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Diablo Tchernobog/Tchernobog.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    install_gecko: false
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/innoextract
    file: inno
- execute:
    args: --extract $gog --output-dir "$CACHE/"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract/innoextract
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Diablo Tchernobog/
    file: tchernobog
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Diablo Tchernobog/
    src: $CACHE/DIABDAT.MPQ
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: ActiveTitle
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: GradientActiveTitle
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 242 59 13
wine:
  Desktop: true
